definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Isaak: Isaac, son of Abr. and Sarah (he laugheth, cf. play upon name Ge 18:12 f. (J), Ge 21:6 (E), Ge 17:17, Ge 17:19 (P); Ge 26:8 (J));—[[יִחְחָק]] Ge 21:3, Ge 21:4, Ge 21:5 (E) +, Ge 24:62, Ge 24:63, Ge 24:67 (J) +, Ge 17:19, Ge 17:21 (P) +, (80 t. Gn, 9 t. Ex, 7 t. Dt), Le 26:42, Nu 32:11, Jos 24:3, Jos 24:4, 1Ki 18:36, 2Ch 13:23, 1Ch 1:28, 1Ch 1:34, 1Ch 1:34, 1Ch 16:16, 1Ch 29:18, 2Ch 30:6; † [[יִשְׂחָק]] Je 33:26, Ps 105:9, and (=Israel) [[בָּמוֹת יִשְׂחָק]] Am 7:9, [[בֵּית יִשְׂחָק]] v:Am 7:16.
